abstract.p: Photo of Robert Frank, with his explanation

block.p: It was after the realization that I should be in the background instead of the foreground. I'm not anymore in the foreground. What I do now or the way I do it or the way I feel about it or the way things are is that I'm in the background. Why is this 75-year-old guy standing here among these young people and taking photographs? They are Swedish students from a school of photography in Stockholm. I mean, they'll take care of it. I am on another track. I just have to accept that I'd get older.
